discriminator.value: Replace with a random string: lowercase letters only

appServiceContributerRoleGuid.value: A Guid that will serve as the name for the roleAssignment. Should be unique and remain constant

appServiceContributerClientId.value: ClientId of the Service Principal that the LetsEncrypt extension should use

appServiceContributorObjectId.value: ObjectId of the Service Principal that the LetsEncrypt extension should use

appServiceContributerClientSecret.value: ClientSecret of the Service Principal that the LetsEncrypt extension should use -- Pro tip: DO NOT CHECK THIS INTO SOURCE CONTROL, USE A KEY VAULT
